thread.title: MBTA needs help IDing Orange Line man accused of sex act - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: MBTA needs help IDing Orange Line man accused of sex act - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: MBTA needs help IDing Orange Line man accused of sex act - Massachusetts news
text:
The MBTA is looking for help identifying a man they say committed an unspecified sex act on the Orange Line.
Related Link Get today’s headlines right in your inbox Transit Police released a photo of the man as he exited at Forest Hills at around 1:25 p.m. on Wednesday October 14.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Transit Police said the suspect is approximately 40 years old, and was wearing a blue and white hooded sweatshirt with a letter “O” with wings on the front. He was also wearing green pants, a blue baseball cap, and brown shoes.
Anybody with any information can contact TPD’s Criminal Investigations Unit at 617-222-1050, anonymously text a tip to 873873, or use the See Say app .
